sentences.en: A court of law is not infallible.
Although he was experienced, he was not infallible.
sentences.cn: 尽管他经验丰富，却并非不会出错。

sentences.en: As we now possess these infallible signs, let us commence our march.
sentences.cn: 现在既然已经掌握了这么可靠的线索,那我们就马上去追吧.

sentences.en: Conclusions: This method is infallible and the result is satisfying.
sentences.cn: 结论方法可靠,结果令人满意.

sentences.en: He had an infallible cure for a hangover.
sentences.cn: 他有对付宿醉绝对灵验的良方。

sentences.en: His judgment in this matter was by no means infallible.
sentences.cn: 在这件事上他的判断决不是无可指摘的.

sentences.en: I know an infallible cure for hiccups.
sentences.cn: 我知道一种治打嗝肯定有效的药物.

sentences.en: In systems based on infallible truth there can be only one authorized interpretation.
sentences.cn: 那些建立在所谓不可能有错的真理基础之上的体系,其内部只能容许有一家权威性的解释.
没有一个专家永远正确。
我们当中无论谁都会犯错误的.

sentences.en: Not an infallible one, and certainly no substitute for an in - depth investigation.
sentences.cn: 这不是确实可信的判断, 当然也不可能替代深入的调查.

sentences.en: People's faith in the Emperor was based on the myth that he was infallible.
sentences.cn: 人们效忠君主是基于他永无过失的神话.

sentences.en: She had an infallible eye for style.
sentences.cn: 在时尚方面她的眼光错不了。

sentences.en: The Catholic Church considers the Pope infallible.
sentences.cn: 天主教会认为罗马教皇绝对正确.

sentences.en: They are risk takers and feel they are infallible.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢冒险,还总觉得自己是对的.

sentences.en: We were a sort of royalty, almost infallible, with a sort of magic around us.
sentences.cn: 我们象皇亲国戚一样, 几乎是无可指摘的, 在我们周围有一种魔力.

trans.tran_cn: 绝对可靠的，一贯正确的，万无一失的
trans.tran_en: always right and never making mistakes

trans.tran_cn: 永远正确的人；绝无谬误的事物
